author: Special Correspondent
text:
: A large number of devotees offered worship at major temples in the district on the occasion of ‘Panguni Uthiram’.

Special ‘pujai’ and ‘alankaram’ were performed to the presiding deities at various Saivite and Vaishnavite temples on the occasion.

In Kumbakonam, the idols of Sri Nageswarar -- Sri Brahayanayaki and Sri Adhikambatta Viswanatha Swamy -- Sri Ananda Nidhi Ambal were brought to the Magamaham tank on the occasion of ‘Panguni Uthiram’.

Religious fervour pervaded the area as float festival was held all through the day.

Special pujai was performed marking the ‘theerthavari’ at the tank.
title: Panguni Uthiram: devotees throng temples
